web_snippets: Shelby Mahurin is an American young adult fiction author, best known for writing the Serpent & Dove trilogy. Shelby Mahurin. Born, May 21, 1992.
Shelby Mahurin grew up on a small farm in rural Indiana, where sticks became wands and cows became dragons. Her rampant imagination didn't fade with age.
